name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Java Engineer with 8 years of experience in designing and implementing high-performance solutions. Proficient in **Java**, **Spring**, **Docker**, **Microservices**, **Kubernetes**, and **OpenShift**, I leverage my expertise to build scalable applications in Agile environments. My technical prowess includes database management with **SQL** and **NoSQL**, ensuring seamless data operations. 
In addition to my core skill set, I have rich experience in leveraging **AWS** for cloud solutions and engaging in CI/CD practices that enhance deployment efficiency. I foster strong communication and collaboration within teams to deliver on complex projects. My background also includes developing sophisticated client-side applications using **React** and integrating them with backend services effectively. With a commitment to quality, I prioritize unit testing and code reviews to maintain robustness and reliability in the software development lifecycle.
